name: Animal Police
description:
You're a crazy driver, running throughout Proc Town and hitting all the bouncy animals! The local police force are after you, but if you run into them they blow up! Hit as many bouncy animals and blow up as many police cars as you can to score points!

Note the bounciness of the animals - they won't be harmed by you hitting them :)

Press 'J' to restart the game!

Proc Town is procedurally generated with a random walk algorithm and every road, house, tree, animal, and police car is generated at runtime.

Scores are calculated by the amount of animals you hit and how many police car you blow up!

Post your high scores in the comments!

Please let me know if you find any bugs!

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SaxOps1
